backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing access-controlled user profiles, workspace listings, and bookings with persistent maps and authorization checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file for reference or tooling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme tokens and base styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines TanStack Router routes and wraps the app in AppShell, ThemeProvider, and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthButtons: Sign-in and sign-out buttons using Internet Identity and clearing query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Guard component that requires Internet Identity authentication before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/bookings/Booking: UI card showing a single booking’s workspace name, time, hours, and total cost with click handling.
frontend/src/components/bookings/MockChe: Renders a mock payment flow allowing users to pick a method, confirm, and trigger workspace booking via useCreateBooking.
Provides the app layout with a main content container and persistent bottom navigation.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Botto: Displays a fixed bottom navigation bar highlighting the active route with icons and links.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileM: Shows profile-related menu actions and opens placeholder modals; includes sign‑out.
frontend/src/components/workspaces/Ameni: Provides checkbox-based selection of predefined workspace amenities.
frontend/src/components/workspaces/Photo: Allows users to select workspace photos from a predefined set with visual highlighting.
frontend/src/components/workspaces/Works: Displays a workspace preview card with photo, name, location, rate, and amenities count.
Implements an image carousel for workspace photos with navigation arrows and indicators.
frontend/src/data/seedWorkspaces.ts: Defines a list of sample Workspace objects with preset details for seeding or demos.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useBookings.ts: Provides a mutation hook for creating workspace bookings and invalidates booking queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, handling login, stored identities, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useMyBookings.ts: Fetches the current user's bookings using react-query and the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useMyListings.ts: Fetches the user's workspace listings and provides a mutation to add new workspaces.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Loads the current user's profile and provides a mutation to save profile updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useWorkspaces.ts: Returns seeded workspace data and allows lookup of individual workspaces by ID.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup with custom color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/format.ts: Formatting helpers for INR currency and booking timestamps.
frontend/src/lib/uiText.ts: Centralized UI text strings for navigation, auth, listings, bookings, and common labels.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility for merging class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point configuring QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering.
frontend/src/pages/AddListingPage.tsx: Form page for creating a new workspace listing with validation and submission via mutation.
frontend/src/pages/BookingDetailsPage.ts: Displays details of a selected booking including workspace info and formatted timing.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Homepage listing available workspaces with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/MyBookingsPage.tsx: Displays the user's bookings with loading, error, and empty states, using workspace data to label each booking.
frontend/src/pages/MyListingsPage.tsx: Shows the user's workspace listings with image previews, pricing, and actions, including loading, error, and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/profile/PlaceholderSc: Provides a modal dialog indicating a feature is not yet available.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Renders the authenticated user's profile info, principal ID, and profile menu with loading skeletons.
Loads and displays workspace details, amenities, pricing, and booking flow with navigation and error handling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines project state and requirements for the WorkNest workspace-booking app, including navigation, features, images, and INR-based marketplace details. Lists implemented features, architectural notes, and image requirements.
